properties.areaDesc: Breton Sound; Chandeleur Sound; Coastal Waters from Boothville LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River out 20 nm; Coastal Waters from Port Fourchon LA to Lower Atchafalaya River LA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from the Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana out 20 NM
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 5 at 4:03AM CST until February 7 at 3:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to 1 NM or less. For the Small Craft Advisory, south
winds 20 to 25 kt and seas 6 to 8 ft expected. For the Gale
Watch, west winds 30 to 35 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 7
to 10 ft possible.

* WHERE...Chandeleur Sound, Breton Sound, Coastal Waters from
Port Fourchon LA to Lower Atchafalaya River LA out 20 nm,
Coastal waters from the Southwest Pass of the Mississippi
River to Port Fourchon Louisiana out 20 NM and Coastal Waters
from Boothville LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River
out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM CST this
morning. For the Small Craft Advisory, from noon today to noon
CST Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from Thursday afternoon
through late Thursday night.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON CST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT
